response.message: At the ginormous Salesforce.com Dreamforce conference, they trot out a big walking, waving No Software logo mascot with arms & legs. It is actually named "SaaSy" and looks like one of Justin Timberlake's "Omletteville" costumes from the Saturday Night Live sketches.

There is a bar in Seattle that actually has a ban on Google Glass.

http://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2013/03/seattle-bar-bans-google-glass-still-loves-beer-goggles/
